issue.title: mail.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#search/iqos/FMfcgzQfBGhCzvWQrVTfwqjCHLxBDNnB](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.google.com%2Fmail%2Fu%2F0%2F%23search%2Fiqos%2FFMfcgzQfBGhCzvWQrVTfwqjCHLxBDNnB) ### Comment > If I enable AdGuard URL Tracking Filter > The IQOS promotional email does not appear in Gmail ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/mlxhw3j5834o4cg840gw0k4sk0g080osicerb51q00.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/9qvjf855q0cocsw0o8c084w8g8wcgo8gzvjc1g6d34.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/irec0orw0bkgcckw0w0gkwwc4cgc0g5bv8uhd4n58o.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.700.1 MV2 System version: | `Windows 10` Browser: | Firefox Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base
